t:
It is said that just before you die, your whole life flashes before your eyes.



But as my death approached, I finally realized,

    what I've been experiencing upto
      this point was actually the flash.
c:
What if your life's a flash?



Write a #shortstory titled #mylifeinblackandwhite.  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#life #flash #death #surprise #helpless
